channel.title: Which drugs should really be illegal? why and why not?
channel.description:
I been researching and some illegal drugs with harsh penalties still exist such as psilocybin mushrooms and cannabis, but when studied they promote new brain cells, Quite possibly reduce anxiety and promote better moods, with little to no toxicity I have never heard of death from Psilocybin mushrooms/cannabis itself, you would probably have to ingest an amount that would kill you from the physical overload and trauma rather than toxicity itself, too much caffeine, fat, Pop/soda, sugar probably does more damage then these substances What are your opinions? and if you took too much of any substances fact is you'll probably feel a lot less healthy, whereas cannabis or psilocin will probably just make you fall alsleep.
Compare Smoking cannabis buds to alcohol for an example Or Alcohol to amanita muscaria Sure smoking has it's downsides, but so does ingestion.

item.title: Which drugs should really be illegal? why and why not?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:9, topic:524494”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=643044.msg4332045#msg4332045 date=1373786443]
Their has never been a recorded overdose from LSD ever - you should be fine with that.

LSD, MDMA, Ketamine and the less ‘harmful’ drugs should be made legal and taxed imho.
[/quote]I’m not sure I’d classify ketamine as “non harmful”. Isn’t is heavily physically addictive? Fun none the less, but I also find it promotes the use of needles which I find really gross. Snorting it is cool and all and I enjoyed it but I’ve always been told IV is the way to go and also read that online.[/quote]

I’m not so sure you understand what ketamine is, it has no physical addiction and needles are only used in extreme cases ~1% of users.

The only addiction is a phycological one and is true of any drug, if you have an addictive personality you will probably enjoy taking drugs - no matter what, and because ketamine is cheap and readily available you will probably do that.

http://www.steps2rehab.com/addictions/ketamine/

Whilst there is no evidence for the development of a physical dependency to Ketamine, the chances of developing a psychological addiction are high. Thus, while an abuser can stop using without any known withdrawal effects, the desire to continue to use remains significantly strong.

Read full topic
item.source: Which drugs should really be illegal? why and why not?

item.title: Which drugs should really be illegal? why and why not?
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:11, topic:524494”]Uhhh, bathsalts was an alternative to the clean, awesome drugs that are illegal. [/quote]Exactly this. Sortof lol.

Wouldn’t call meth awesome, but if it wasn’t illegaal it never would have been cut up with god knows what else, which is really the most dangerous part. Especially in drugs like heroin where some places its purity is less than 10%. Just because of black market.

Drugs will always exist. There ill always be a demand you can’t make them just go away, so why not deal with it in a way which will save lives and minimize damages (both physically and socially).

Read full topic

item.title: Which drugs should really be illegal? why and why not?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

the bank:

I personally believe all drugs should be legal. People should be allowed to choose what they put into their bodies, and by the removal of the “black market” organized crime would start to fizzle away.

Starts to get risky when you have shit like bath salts out there where you put others in danger

I couldn’t give two shits if people get shitfaced in their own home, but they better not be on the road with me

Read full topic
item.source: Which drugs should really be illegal? why and why not?

item.title: Which drugs should really be illegal? why and why not?
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

I personally believe all drugs should be legal. People should be allowed to choose what they put into their bodies, and by the removal of the “black market” organized crime would start to fizzle away.

What should be illegal is the mistakes people make on drugs. If I do an 8ball of coke, go out and kill someone, then charge me with murder. But if I do an 8ball of coke and commit no violent crimes or effect anyone in a negative manner then why should I be in trouble?

Having said this, I think many drugs are very terrible and evil, cocaine being by far the most evil, and don’t suggest anyone ever does it.

Cannabis being legal is just a generally accepted fact by everyone who, unfortunately, has no say in its legality. One day when the old generations die off and ours take parliament things will be different.

[quote=“tigerclan, post:2, topic:524494”]I’m not an expert but you can probably overdose on shrooms. I ate a 1/4 oz and had the worst trip ever[/quote]No, no you can’t.

[quote=“Ollie, post:7, topic:524494”]Their has never been a recorded overdose from LSD ever - you should be fine with that.

LSD, MDMA, Ketamine and the less ‘harmful’ drugs should be made legal and taxed imho.[/quote]I’m not sure I’d classify ketamine as “non harmful”. Isn’t is heavily physically addictive? Fun none the less, but I also find it promotes the use of needles which I find really gross. Snorting it is cool and all and I enjoyed it but I’ve always been told IV is the way to go and also read that online.

Read full topic
item.source: Which drugs should really be illegal? why and why not?

I would like to see someone try to overdose on LSD. You’d go fuckin’ lost. You wouldn’t even be able to think “I’m not dead yet, lets eat consume a few more hits”. You’d have to have someone kill you with it lol

item.title: Which drugs should really be illegal? why and why not?
item.dc:creator: @Demnish Demnish
item.description:
@Demnish wrote:

^ you can probably on overdose on virtually anything if you do think about it that way
No deaths from cannabis, but smoking/heat does/could lower humidity which could irritate your lungs
and lol it does cause coughing if you smoke it
but cannabis probably wouldn’t kill you unless you did something stupid like injected it.
Maybe you ate a toxic mushroom that catalyzed you into a bad trip?
set and setting lol, just kidding, no really, almost anything could kill you it’s just that
these substances are a legit concern, search it up psilocin promotes new brain cells, cannabis is neuroprotective,
tobacco is beneficial in treating parkinsons/alzheimers, etc
